session_summary: Deborah and Jolene met at 4:06 pm on 23 January, 2023. They discussed their busy weeks and memories of their deceased mothers. Deborah shared about her mother's old house, while Jolene mentioned her room in her mother's house. They talked about special items that reminded them of their mothers. Jolene discussed a pendant symbolizing freedom, inspiring her to pursue goals. Deborah expressed her goal to teach yoga and bring peace to her community. Yoga helped Deborah find peace during a difficult time. Jolene found Deborah's journey inspiring, and the conversation ended with them looking forward to the next chat.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Hey Jolene, nice to meet you! How's your week going? Anything fun happened?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Hi Deb! Good to meet you! Yeah, my week's been busy. I finished an electrical engineering project last week - took a lot of work, but it's done now. Anything fun happening for you?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Congrats! Last week I visited a place that holds a lot of memories for me. It was my mother`s old house.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Why does it hold such special memories for you?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a woman in a wheelchair hugging a woman in a wheelchair
conversation_turns.text: It was full of memories, she passed away a few years ago. This is our last photo together.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a room with a bench and a window
conversation_turns.query: serene yoga studio windows natural light
conversation_turns.text: Sorry about your loss, Deb. My mother also passed away last year. This is my room in her house, I also have many memories there. Is there anything special about it you remember?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: My mom's house had a special bench near the window. She loved to sit there every morning and take in the view. I come to sit here sometimes, it helps me stay connected to her.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a heart shaped pendant with a bird on it
conversation_turns.text: Staying connected is super important. Do you have something to remember her by? This pendant reminds me of my mother, she gave it to me in 2010  in Paris.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Yes, I also have a pendant that reminds me of my mother. And what is special for you about your jewelry?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: It has a special symbol on it that represents freedom for me. It's a nice reminder to go for my goals and not get held back.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: It should really give you strength and energy!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: One of my goals is to keep teaching yoga and supporting my community. I'm passionate about helping people find peace and joy through it.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: What inspired you to go down this route?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Yoga helped me find peace during a rough time, and now I'm passionate about sharing that with others.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Looking forward to the next chat!

Deborah: Deborah visits her mother's old home while reflecting on her life.
Jolene: Jolene conquers a difficult electrical engineering project.
